alert.note: Alert for Bosque; Erath; Somervell (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued September 14 at 11:29AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 1245 PM CDT THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Portions of central and north central Texas, including the following counties, in central Texas, Bosque. In north central Texas, Erath and Somervell. * WHEN...Until 1245 PM CDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will likely cause urban and small stream flooding. Low lying and/or poor drainage areas will experience minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 2 and 3 inches of rain have fallen. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Glen Rose, Meridian, Iredell, Lake Whitney, Walnut Springs, Morgan, Cedar Shores, Eulogy, Chalk Mountain, Brazos Point, Duffau, Johnsville, Kopperl, Lakeside Village and Selden.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
